sentence.text: Mutations in a number of different genes causative for microcephaly have been identified, e.g., negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, mitotic spindle organization, and spindle organization.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Recently, mutations in the gene encoding the enzyme asparagine synthetase (asparagine biosynthetic process) were associated to microcephaly and so far 24 different mutations in ASNS causing microcephaly have been described.
